page.title: 07FOORD'S FARM 339379
page.content:
Foord's Farm is a cluster of old farm buildings on top of a hill behind the school.Foord's Farm is really called Hill Top Farm and it is owned by Mr. Foord.Mr Foord has 46 dairy cows which he milks twice a day and he has got 5 suckler cows, Mr Foord's cattle are all home bred except for the bull. Mr.Foord has got 2 sheep dogs but he has no sheep, Mr. Foord gets 25 tons of fertiliser and 250 bales of silage.
Mr. Foord has also got 3 tractors and 1 baler which gives small bales of hay. Mr. Foord owns 16 acres of wood scrub and quarry land, and 61 acres of grass, Mr. Foord used to live in the farm house which is more than 100 years old but they live in a modern bungalow now.
